channel.title: A blog, by Nicolás Hatcher
channel.description: Recent content on A blog, by Nicolás Hatcher

item.title: C language Indomitable
item.description: This is a learning and a teaching opportunity. In this blog we will see how to create complex algorithms in C to calculate inverses and determinants of matrices LU

item.title: How to create a blog with Hugo and Github
item.description: Forgive me pretty baby but I always take the long way home.

item.title: Berlin-Frankfurt-Berlin by bike
item.description: (originally published in blogspot) At last, after more than two years, I make my first post.

item.title: This is about me!
item.description: My name is Nicolás Hatcher, I am a theoretical physicist by soul and a computer programmer by trade.
